fi.tuni.mentalsurvival

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.mentalsurvival.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class contains all the methods and information about the player in the game.

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draw the player's texture If player is sleeping, draw the sleeping texture, also if sleeping/drinking, use those textures. Use normal walking animation texture if doing nothing of those mentioned.
        Parameters:
        batch - sprite batch used to draw
